instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2936: What is 820-2936? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A Takes a long time to start
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A when i want to start the computer the white hard drive light turns on and stays on and it takes about one to two minutes to chime and to dvd drive to make the sound. This happens sometimes, not all time. 

I ran the ASD and it passed.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A Takes a long time to start
threads.message: Also there is a issue that the macbook chargers the battery really slow. Tried different battery but does not help. Coconut battery says that its charging with 3.1Wats. Using 85W Charger magsafe 1. Another is when it restarts it beeps and turns on.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A Takes a long time to start
threads.message:
Did you do a PRAM reset? 
I suspect this is a BIOS issue. Upload your original dump and the serial numbers on the RAM slot sticker.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A Takes a long time to start
threads.message: I did many times PRAM reset but did not help. I will send original dump and serial numbers on the RAM slot sticker.
